languages.text: "Вы тоже об этом подумали?" {n}Взгляд Ардженты полнится ясностью полуденного неба.{/n} "Слова веры способны излечить любую рану, даже ту, что кровоточит лишь сомнениями. Я помогу этим людям".

traits.locale_text: "Вы тоже об этом подумали?" {n}Взгляд Ардженты полнится ясностью полуденного неба.{/n} "Слова веры способны излечить любую рану, даже ту, что кровоточит лишь сомнениями. Я помогу этим людям".
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "You were thinking about it as well?" {n}Argenta's gaze is as clear as the midday sky.{/n} "Words of faith can heal any wound, even those that bleed naught but doubt. I will help these people."
languages.original_text: "Вы тоже об этом подумали?" {n}Взгляд Ардженты полнится ясностью полуденного неба.{/n} "Слова веры способны излечить любую рану, даже ту, что кровоточит лишь сомнениями. Я помогу этим людям".

traits.locale_text: "You were thinking about it as well?" {n}Argenta's gaze is as clear as the midday sky.{/n} "Words of faith can heal any wound, even those that bleed naught but doubt. I will help these people."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You were thinking about it as well?" {n}Argenta's gaze is as clear as the midday sky.{/n} "Words of faith can heal any wound, even those that bleed naught but doubt. I will help these people."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You were thinking about it as well?" {n}Argenta's gaze is as clear as the midday sky.{/n} "Words of faith can heal any wound, even those that bleed naught but doubt. I will help these people."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You were thinking about it as well?" {n}Argenta's gaze is as clear as the midday sky.{/n} "Words of faith can heal any wound, even those that bleed naught but doubt. I will help these people."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “你也是这么想的吗？”{n}阿洁塔的目光仿佛正午的天空一样清澈。{/n}“信仰的话语可以治愈一切伤口，即使是那些心中只有疑虑的人也不例外。我愿意帮助这些人。”
languages.original_text: "You were thinking about it as well?" {n}Argenta's gaze is as clear as the midday sky.{/n} "Words of faith can heal any wound, even those that bleed naught but doubt. I will help these people."

traits.locale_text: “你也是这么想的吗？”{n}阿洁塔的目光仿佛正午的天空一样清澈。{/n}“信仰的话语可以治愈一切伤口，即使是那些心中只有疑虑的人也不例外。我愿意帮助这些人。”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: «¿Usted también lo estaba pensando?». {n}La mirada de Argenta es tan clara como el cielo de mediodía.{/n} «Las palabras de la fe pueden curar cualquier herida, incluso las que solo sangran duda. Ayudaré a esta gente».
languages.original_text: "You were thinking about it as well?" {n}Argenta's gaze is as clear as the midday sky.{/n} "Words of faith can heal any wound, even those that bleed naught but doubt. I will help these people."

traits.locale_text: «¿Usted también lo estaba pensando?». {n}La mirada de Argenta es tan clara como el cielo de mediodía.{/n} «Las palabras de la fe pueden curar cualquier herida, incluso las que solo sangran duda. Ayudaré a esta gente».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「よくよく考えてのことなのですね？」{n}アルジェンタの視線は真昼の空のように澄みきっている。{/n}「信仰心から生じた言葉はどんな傷も癒やせる。疑いさえ抱かなければ、血の一滴を流さぬ者さえも。こうした人々を救いましょう」
languages.original_text: "You were thinking about it as well?" {n}Argenta's gaze is as clear as the midday sky.{/n} "Words of faith can heal any wound, even those that bleed naught but doubt. I will help these people."

traits.locale_text: 「よくよく考えてのことなのですね？」{n}アルジェンタの視線は真昼の空のように澄みきっている。{/n}「信仰心から生じた言葉はどんな傷も癒やせる。疑いさえ抱かなければ、血の一滴を流さぬ者さえも。こうした人々を救いましょう」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Le regard d'Argenta est aussi clair qu'un ciel de midi.{/n} « Vous m'ôtez les mots de la bouche. Rien de tel que la sainte parole pour apaiser les tourments de l'âme, à commencer par le doute. Je vais de ce pas venir en aide à ces brebis égarées. »
languages.original_text: "You were thinking about it as well?" {n}Argenta's gaze is as clear as the midday sky.{/n} "Words of faith can heal any wound, even those that bleed naught but doubt. I will help these people."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le regard d'Argenta est aussi clair qu'un ciel de midi.{/n} « Vous m'ôtez les mots de la bouche. Rien de tel que la sainte parole pour apaiser les tourments de l'âme, à commencer par le doute. Je vais de ce pas venir en aide à ces brebis égarées. »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Daran habt Ihr auch schon gedacht?" {n}Argentas Blick ist so klar wie der Mittagshimmel.{/n} "Worte des Glaubens können jede Wunde heilen, selbst jene, aus der nur Zweifel bluten. Ich werde diesen Menschen helfen."
languages.original_text: "You were thinking about it as well?" {n}Argenta's gaze is as clear as the midday sky.{/n} "Words of faith can heal any wound, even those that bleed naught but doubt. I will help these people."

traits.locale_text: "Daran habt Ihr such schon gedacht?" {n}Argentas Blick ist so klar wie der Mittagshimmel.{/n} "Worte des Glaubens können jede Wunde heilen, selbst jene, aus der nur Zweifel bluten. Ich werde diesen Menschen helfen."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Ben de aynısını düşünüyordum." {n}Argenta'nın bakışı, öğlen göğü kadar temiz.{/n} "İman kelamıyla iyileşmeyecek yara yoktur, içi sadece kuşkuyla dolu olanların yaralarını bile iyileştirir. Bu insanlara yardım edeceğim."
languages.original_text: "You were thinking about it as well?" {n}Argenta's gaze is as clear as the midday sky.{/n} "Words of faith can heal any wound, even those that bleed naught but doubt. I will help these people."

traits.locale_text: "Ben de aynısını düşünüyordum." {n}Argenta'nın bakışı, öğlen göğü kadar temiz.{/n} "İman kelamıyla iyileşmeyecek yara yoktur, içi sadece kuşkuyla dolu olanların yaralarını bile iyileştirir. Bu insanlara yardım edeceğim."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
